sentences.en: 3 is a factor of 15.
sentences.cn: 3是15的因子。

sentences.en: Alcohol is a contributory factor in 10% of all road accidents.
sentences.cn: 所有交通事故中有10%是酒后驾车造成的。

sentences.en: factor 15 suntan oil
sentences.cn: 防晒系数为15的防晒油

sentences.en: Geographical distance is also a factor.
sentences.cn: 地理距离也是个因素。

sentences.en: He's keen, but his youth is a minus factor.
sentences.cn: 他非常精明, 但他的年轻却是个不利的因素.

sentences.en: I factor ed my uncle's estate for three years.
sentences.cn: 我代管我叔父的财产已有三年了.

sentences.en: If you want to sell your house quickly, it needs a wow factor.
sentences.cn: 若想很快把房子卖掉，就得找个卖点。

sentences.en: Man is a decisive factor in doing everything.
sentences.cn: 人是做每件事情的决定性因素.

sentences.en: Obesity is a major risk factor in many diseases.
sentences.cn: 肥胖是引发多种疾病的重要因素。

sentences.en: Poor organization was certainly a contributory factor to the crisis.
sentences.cn: 组织不善肯定是导致危机的因素之一.

sentences.en: Smoking is a causative factor in several major diseases.
sentences.cn: 抽烟是引起几种严重疾病的病因。

sentences.en: Take the wind-chill factor into account.
sentences.cn: 把风寒指数考虑进去。

sentences.en: The candidate was seriously damaged by the sleaze factor.
sentences.cn: 那位候选人的形象因丑闻而受到严重损害。

sentences.en: The closure of the mine was the single most important factor in the town's decline.
sentences.cn: 矿山的关闭是这个镇衰落的唯一最重要的因素。

sentences.en: the feel-good factor.
sentences.cn: 幸福感这一因素。

sentences.en: The rise in crime is mainly due to social and economic factors.
sentences.cn: 犯罪率上升主要由社会和经济因素造成。

sentences.en: This factor will come increasingly to the fore as election day nears.
sentences.cn: 随着选举日的临近，这一因素将愈发重要。

sentences.en: We factored sick days and vacations in when we prepared the work schedule.
sentences.cn: 当我们准备工作时间表时，我们把病假和假期都包括在内

sentences.en: when the psychological costs are factored in, a different picture will emerge.
sentences.cn: 如果将心理成本计算在内，结果就不同了。

sentences.en: With the chill factor, it's nearly minus forty here.
sentences.cn: 加上风寒指数, 气温接近零下40度.

sentences.en: You'd better consider this and factor this into your decision making.
sentences.cn: 你最好考虑一下这一点，并在做决定时将其考虑在内。

words.tran_cn: [数] 因子分解，[数] 因式分解；保付代理
[数] 因子分解；[数] 因式分解
把…因素包括进去（factor的ing形式）
因式分解；把复杂计算分解为基本运算

phrases.tran_cn: （计算或作决定时）包括（或排除）某一相关因素
增长因子；增长系数；放大因子；经济增长因素
n. 影响因素；电话干扰系数
主因子，准素因子；一次因素
[物]品质因数；[核]品质因子；[物]质量指标
应力强度因子；应力强度因数
…这一因素（指对结果会产生难以预见的有力影响之物）

trans.tran_en: one of several things that influence or cause a situation
to divide a number into factors
